alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:13AM CDT until July 29 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greeley County in central Nebraska... Nance County in central Nebraska... Valley County in central Nebraska... Western Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Merrick County in central Nebraska... Eastern Sherman County in central Nebraska... Howard County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 512 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spalding to Cotesfield to near Rockville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. This storm has a history of producing measured gusts of 70 to 80 mph in Valley County. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cotesfield around 515 AM CDT. Spalding, Elba, Farwell and Rockville around 520 AM CDT. St. Paul, Cushing and Boelus around 530 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Dannebrog, Cairo, Palmer, St. Libory, Belgrade and Alda. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 309 and 323. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover.

area.areaDesc: Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman; Valley
